title: FLUXBLOG 2010 SURVEY MIX
description:
FLUXBLOG 2010 SURVEY MIX: http://www.fluxblog.org/2010/12/fluxblog-2010-survey-mix


This eight-disc, 157 song mix is a survey of some of the best and most notable music from 2010. ItÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s fairly comprehensive, covering indie, pop, rock, punk, folk, rap, R&B, soul, dance, country, modern classical, ambient and electronic music, and in many cases, hard-to-classify genre hybrids. I inevitably had to leave out some things, but I think youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll find that this serves as both a helpful guide to some of the yearÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s most exciting music and a surprisingly listenable series of mixes. Discover new stuff! Rediscover familiar artists in a new context! Jam out to ten and a half hours of world-class tunes! If you enjoy this, please do pass it on.
